title: Only In AUGUST
body_text:

In an iconic, unprecedented, never-before-witnessed clash, quite possibly the four most destructive forces to
ever
compete will indeed wage war for the first - and last - time when
Chris Adams
and
John Tronolone

and
Kevin Megill
.
The stakes could not get any more crucial either for if "The Axe" and "The Creation" are defeated, they will

body_html:
This just may be it ladies and gentlemen - perhaps the single, biggest attraction of them all and only "Immaculate Redemption" will play host.

In an iconic, unprecedented, never-before-witnessed clash, quite possibly the four most destructive forces to ever compete will indeed wage war for the first - and last - time when Chris Adams and John Tronolone epically collide with Kevin Adams and Kevin Megill.

The stakes could not get any more crucial either for if "The Axe" and "The Creation" are defeated, they will retire their captaincy forever.

The incredible, half-decade-long story on how this magnificently star-studded confrontation came about will be available in the coming week.
